channel.title: About Food
channel.managingEditor: about-food@solidgoldstudios.co.za (Adele Stiehler-vd Westhuizen | Solid Gold Podcast Studios)
channel.copyright: © Adele Stiehler-vd Westhuizen - all rights reserved
channel.description:
After 20 years at the forefront of professional culinary training, the Prue Leith Chefs Academy has invested R10.5 million in new kitchen and lecture facilities, confirming its place at the leading edge of culinary tuition in South Africa and Africa.

Recorded and produced at https://SolidGoldStudios.co.za #BeHeard
channel.itunes:subtitle: Training great people in the culinary fields
channel.itunes:author: Adele | Solid Gold Podcast Studios

item.title: Welcome to the Prue Leith Culinary Institute | Prue Leith

item.description:
Meet the grand dame herself - Prue Leith.

Music : Stephan Gericke


Visit the Prue Leith Culinary Institute web site https://www.prueleith.co.za/
